Blacknightmare:

"Get OUT THIS NECROSS!!!!! WHY DON?T YOU SHOT THE 
CCANNON!!!!!"shouted angered the femme


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> OOC:  Splattercannon is fighting Hydras.  Necross was waiting for 
such an oppertunity to show himself.
>  
> Necross:
>  
> "Well, look at all the trouble your pet has caused you.  For the 
good of Unicron, I'll have to destroy him.  Say goodbye to him," 
Necross said, levelling his missile blaster.
>

> Blacknightmare
>

soon,

>

you
